root: ^Earth sits down opposite you. He grins awkwardly.

earth_1_3: ^I didn't know I couldn't call you that anymore.
earth_4: ^My life doesn't revolve around you, you know.
^Just like you don't revolve around me anymore.
^Venus asked me along. They've been helping me out since you left. It's been rough...
earth_5: ^That's not really your business. Not anymore.
^Things have been rough since you left. Venus has been helping me out.
^They thought that dating might help me get out of my orbit for a while. Give me something else to think about.
earth_6: ^I mean, not great to be honest.
^I'm getting better now. But Moon, you just left.
^We had no idea where you were, why you'd gone...
earth_a: ^I still don't understand why you left us. Why did you do it Moon?
earth_7:
^Oh. Wow.

^It's that simple, huh?


^Sorry. It's a lot to take in...

^Deep breaths Earth, deep breaths.

^I... I can't deny that it hurts to hear you say that. It hurts a lot.

^But it's better than not knowing why you left.

^... I can't hold it against you. That wouldn't be fair. You feel what you feel, know what I mean?

^And I won't ask for you back. If you don't want me then there's no point.

^But hey, we're here to socialise right? How about we catch up? A lot's changed since you left.
earth_8: ^I... I didn't know you felt that way.
^No. No, that's not true. I can understand why you felt like that.
^Ever since we created life together I've been completely focussed on myself.
^It was just too exciting. The children kept growing and learning and changing, and they kept changing me... It was addictive.
earth_9: ^You walked out on us because you needed a change? You could at least have said something!
^You would have tried to make me stay.
earth_17: ^Maybe. Would that have been so bad?
^Was staying with us really that hard for you?
^Was there really nothing that would have made you want to stay? Nothing I could have changed?
earth_10: ^Yes, us. Your family. Me and the children; all of the living beings on my surface.
^The nights are darker. The tides don't work. And the sea turtles...
^Well, maybe you don't want to know what happened to the sea turtles.
^They aren't my children. They're your children.
earth_12: ^I... I didn't know you felt that way.
earth_16: ^I know they live on my surface but they wouldn't be who they are without you. You had a huge part in raising them.
^They think of you as a parent. They love you. They literally look up to you.
^I'm sorry. It must have been hard for you, putting up with the responsibility of a trillion children and getting nothing back.
^All of their gifts went to me.
^Oh god. I didn't even realise how neglected you were...
^I don't know if I can make up for that... But I'd like to try, if you would let me.
^A lot's changed since you left. And I'm ready to do whatever I need to to repair our relationship.
^Even if I can't be your partner I... I really hope we can come to be friends.
^Maybe we could start right now. We're both here. We have good coffee. And I have so much to tell you!
^Whaddyasay? Should we just, you know, talk a while?
earth_13: ^They're literally tiny pockets of the universe observing itself. They're practically divine!
earth_14: ^Okay, okay. We have fundamentally different views about life.
^I can respect that. We don't have to agree on everything.
^But if we can I'd really like to try and repair this bridge.
^Things can't go back to how they were. Maybe that's a good thing. Maybe we can find a new way to get along.
^I miss you Moon. I want you back in my world. As a friend if nothing else.
^But only if you want that too.
^Whaddyasay? We're both here, we have good coffee. And I have so much to tell you about. Can we just talk a while?
earth_15: ^I won't apologise for our children's natural tendency to investigate other celestial bodies.
^They need to explore. They need to grow and learn to be self sufficient.
^I won't be here to look after them forever. And you certainly won't.
earth_end_1: ^Man, I really thought we could make something better of this. Make amends, maybe even be friends. But I guess not.
^Hello my lovelies! How is your little exchange going? Are we hitting it off?
^Well, this round is almost over. Please say your farewells and we'll progress to the next round.
^Bye Moon. I hope you find what you need.
earth_end_2: ^I'm glad that I got to see you at least.
^I'm glad I got some insight into why you left.
^And I'm glad to know that you're moving on. Because it means that I can too.
earth_end_2d: ^I thought I'd wait for you two to finish your conversation before coming over. I'm sure you had a lot to talk about.
^This round is now over. I'll take your drink order, then we'll proceed.
